text: Classless Act is an American rock band formed in Los Angeles, California in 2018. == Influences == Classless Act's influences include Godsmack, Sons of Albion, Wargasm, Turbogeist, Wolfmother, Guns N' Roses, Pop Evil, The Darkness, David Cook, Greta Van Fleet, Tokio Hotel, Reef, The Rock N Roll Junkies, Lenny Kravitz, Holder and Slade, CO-OP, Reckless Love, New York Dolls, Thin Lizzy, Captain Wails and the Harpoons, The Treatment, Midtown, Rolan Bolan, Cibo Matto, Mammoth WVH, David Bowie, The Dives, Drowning Pool, Taking Back Sunday and The Damned. == Members == * Derek Day - lead vocals (2018-present) * Dane Pieper - rhythm guitar, backing vocals (2018-present) * Griffin Tucker - lead guitar, backing vocals (2020-present) * Franco Gravante - bass, backing vocals (2018-present) * Chuck McKissock - drums, percussion (2020-present) == Discography == == References == == Other website == * Official website Category:American hard rock bands Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Glam metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 2018 Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles
title: Classless Act
